Package org.maxicp.cp.engine.core

Interface CPInsertionVar

All Known Implementing Classes:
CPSequenceVarImpl.CPInsertionVarInSequence
public interface CPInsertionVar
This variable represents the set of nodes after which this node can be inserted. An insertion point is defined by an integer i and is supposed to be valid if this node can be inserted after node i. Invalid insertion points are assumed to be removed by the constraints. A CPInsertionVar can be empty domain and still be valid. However, a constraint can be added to throw an inconsistency whenever an InsertionVar is empty.

    • fillInsertion

      int fillInsertion(int[] dest)
      Copies the values of the insertions points into an array. each entry of the array contains a valid predecessor
      Parameters:
      dest - an array large enough dest.length >= size() && dest[0,...,size-1].length >= 2
      Returns:
      the size of the domain and dest[0,...,size-1] contains the values in the domain in an arbitrary order

    • size

      int size()
      Returns:

    • propagateOnInsert

      void propagateOnInsert(CPConstraint c)
      Asks that CPConstraint.propagate() is called whenever the domain of this variable is reduced to a singleton. In such a state the variable is fixed.
      Parameters:
      c - the constraint for which the CPConstraint.propagate() method should be called on bind events of this variable.

      Parameters:

      void propagateOnDomainChange(CPConstraint c)
      Asks that CPConstraint.propagate() is called whenever the domain of this variable changes. We say that a change event occurs.
      Parameters:
      c - the constraint for which the CPConstraint.propagate() method should be called on change events of this variable.

    • whenFixed

      void whenFixed(Procedure f)
      Asks that the closure is called whenever no inserted point remains for this variable. This occurs when the insertion variable is either inserted or excluded
      Parameters:
      f - the closure

    • propagateOnFix

      void propagateOnFix(CPConstraint c)
      Asks that CPConstraint.propagate() to be called when no inserted point remains for this variable. This occurs when the insertion variable is either inserted or excluded.
      Parameters:
      c - the constraint for which the CPConstraint.propagate() method should be called on fix of this variable.
